full_threads.body:
‌
@Joel, these are the sample images to appear on Hover. Perhaps @glen / @jaime can format them for you.

Please note, we still need the big light box view of the normal image too.

Cheers!

Heath Maguire
Creative Director
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Monday, 6 December 2021 4:58 PM
To: Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Website updates

Hey Heath,

Great to chat last Friday (sorry Keenan and I were such zombies). We're feeling much better after a restful weekend haha

Few things to update you on following our chat -

  1. How to specify text

  • I have noticed the one for wall and ceiling is exact same, floor is slightly different. If we're only managing 2 versions are we able to keep these separate? If yes please pull from our excel as I think Keenan's template might had outdated copy.

  1. Weave updates

  • Updated copy, swatches and spec sheet linked and added to our excel, highlighted yellow.

  1. Staff messages

  • Ben happy for the 'Staff/People' messages to not go through SF forms, and to feed directly through to that staff.message mailbox

  1. SF forms update

  • I have followed up Em but unfortunately they are taking the week off to train new staff so im unsure when I'll get a response. Will keep following them up though, and if we haven't' heard anything by next week I'll go to John directly.

  1. Whispatex

  • We don't be publishing this page until Jan, so we are we able to revert this to draft form for now and remove from menu nav?

  1. Sample photography

  • We're getting our hands on these tomorrow, so just need Keenan to edit and send to you. You should expect these by EOD Wed.

Let me know if there was anything else you were needing from me?

Also - are we able to move this Friday's meeting to Thursday instead? Keenan taking leave Friday. Happy to do same time (4pm), otherwise let us know when you're free.

Thanks Heath, talk soon!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager
